feed.title: NPMplus Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NPMplus: 2024-06-28-r1
entry.content:
Changes

  • dep updates
  • disable must staple for new instances

How to update

  • Read the changes above
  • Pull the zoeyvid/npmplus:latest image
  • apply possible changes that maybe effect you from above to your compose.yaml/NPMplus
  • redeploy the compose stack

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ZoeyVid/NPMplus/compare/2024-06-22-r1...2024-06-28-r1

entry.title: New release for NPMplus: 2024-07-11-r1
entry.content:
Changes

  • dep updates
  • merge upstream (fixes a security issue - command injection while creation credential files for dns providers)
  • allow to disable nginxbeautifier #939 by @realies
  • switch to better-sqlite3
  • allow port range in streams #945
  • fix #940
  • more

How to update

  • Read the changes above
  • Pull the zoeyvid/npmplus:latest image
  • apply possible changes that maybe effect you from above to your compose.yaml/NPMplus
  • redeploy the compose stack

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ZoeyVid/NPMplus/compare/2024-06-29-r1...2024-07-11-r1
